description: This file defines a REST controller for managing hotel bookings within an airport facility service project. It provides endpoints for creating and retrieving hotel booking details, interacting with repository classes, and handling requests and responses.

classes.name: HotelBookingController
classes.description: A REST controller class that manages hotel booking operations such as creation and retrieval, utilizing Spring Web annotations and repository dependencies.

methods.name: HotelBookingController
methods.description: Constructor initializing repositories for hotel bookings and general bookings.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve hotel booking details by bookingId, throws NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create new hotel bookings based on request data, throws NotFoundException if the associated booking is not found.
